mapper.sql: id, waybill_no_import, waybill_no_package, status, descrip, customer_id, customer_name, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, write_time, mod_time, waybill_no
waybill_no_import, waybill_no_package, status, descrip, customer_id, customer_name, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, write_time, mod_time, waybill_no
mapper.update:
update biz_outstock_packmaterial_cancel
waybill_no_import = #{waybillNoImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waybill_no_package = #{waybillNoPackage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descrip = #{descrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_name = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
write_time = #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mod_time = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
waybill_no = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_outstock_packmaterial_cancel(waybill_no, waybill_no_import, `status`, write_time) values
( #{item.waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.waybillNoImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE waybill_no_import = VALUES(waybill_no_import), `status` = VALUES(`status`), mod_time = VALUES(write_time)
mapper.select: select a.waybill_no,a.waybill_no_import,a.waybill_no_package,a.customer_id,b.contract_attr as contractAttr from biz_outstock_packmaterial_cancel a LEFT JOIN pub_customer b on a.customer_id=b.customer_id and b.del_flag='0' WHERE 1=1 and a.`status`='BEGIN' and a.waybill_no_import=a.waybill_no_package
mapper.update:
update biz_outstock_packmaterial_cancel
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descrip = #{descrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_time = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where waybill_no = #{waybillNo}
